exceptions/daemon_connection_failed: There was an exception while attempting to communicate with the daemon resulting in a HTTP/:code response code. This exception has been logged.
exceptions/node.servers_attached: A node must have no servers linked to it in order to be deleted.
exceptions/node.daemon_off_config_update: The daemon configuration has been updated, however there was an error encountered while attempting to automatically update the configuration file on the Daemon. You will need to manually update the configuration file (config.yml) for the daemon to apply these changes.
exceptions/allocations.server_using: A server is currently assigned to this allocation. An allocation can only be deleted if no server is currently assigned.
exceptions/allocations.too_many_ports: Adding more than 1000 ports in a single range at once is not supported.
exceptions/allocations.invalid_mapping: The mapping provided for :port was invalid and could not be processed.
exceptions/allocations.cidr_out_of_range: CIDR notation only allows masks between /25 and /32.
exceptions/allocations.port_out_of_range: Ports in an allocation must be greater than 1024 and less than or equal to 65535.
exceptions/nest.delete_has_servers: A Nest with active servers attached to it cannot be deleted from the Panel.
exceptions/nest.egg.delete_has_servers: An Egg with active servers attached to it cannot be deleted from the Panel.
exceptions/nest.egg.invalid_copy_id: The Egg selected for copying a script from either does not exist, or is copying a script itself.
exceptions/nest.egg.must_be_child: The "Copy Settings From" directive for this Egg must be a child option for the selected Nest.
exceptions/nest.egg.has_children: This Egg is a parent to one or more other Eggs. Please delete those Eggs before deleting this Egg.
exceptions/nest.variables.env_not_unique: The environment variable :name must be unique to this Egg.
exceptions/nest.variables.reserved_name: The environment variable :name is protected and cannot be assigned to a variable.
exceptions/nest.variables.bad_validation: The validation rule ":rule" is not a valid rule for this application.
exceptions/nest.importer.json_error: There was an error while attempting to parse the JSON file: :error.
exceptions/nest.importer.file_error: The JSON file provided was not valid.
exceptions/nest.importer.invalid_json_pr: The JSON file provided is not in a format that can be recognized.
exceptions/subusers.editing_self: Editing your own subuser account is not permitted.
exceptions/subusers.user_is_owner: You cannot add the server owner as a subuser for this server.
exceptions/subusers.subuser_exists: A user with that email address is already assigned as a subuser for this server.
exceptions/databases.delete_has_database: Cannot delete a database host server that has active databases linked to it.
exceptions/tasks.chain_interval_too_long: The maximum interval time for a chained task is 15 minutes.
exceptions/locations.has_nodes: Cannot delete a location that has active nodes attached to it.
exceptions/users.node_revocation_failed: Failed to revoke keys on Node #:node. :error
exceptions/deployment.no_viable_nodes: No nodes satisfying the requirements specified for automatic deployment could be found.
exceptions/deployment.no_viable_allocati: No allocations satisfying the requirements for automatic deployment were found.
exceptions/api.resource_not_found: The requested resource does not exist on this server.
passwords/password: Passwords must be at least six characters and match the confirmation.

passwords/token: This password reset token is invalid.

validation/active_url: The :attribute is not a valid URL.
validation/after: The :attribute must be a date after :date.
validation/after_or_equal: The :attribute must be a date after or equal to :date.
validation/alpha_dash: The :attribute may only contain letters, numbers, and dashes.
validation/alpha_num: The :attribute may only contain letters and numbers.
validation/before: The :attribute must be a date before :date.
validation/before_or_equal: The :attribute must be a date before or equal to :date.
validation/between.file: The :attribute must be between :min and :max kilobytes.
validation/between.string: The :attribute must be between :min and :max characters.
validation/between.array: The :attribute must have between :min and :max items.
validation/boolean: The :attribute field must be true or false.
validation/date: The :attribute is not a valid date.
validation/date_format: The :attribute does not match the format :format.
validation/digits_between: The :attribute must be between :min and :max digits.
validation/distinct: The :attribute field has a duplicate value.
validation/email: The :attribute must be a valid email address.
validation/in_array: The :attribute field does not exist in :other.
validation/ip: The :attribute must be a valid IP address.
validation/json: The :attribute must be a valid JSON string.
validation/max.numeric: The :attribute may not be greater than :max.
validation/max.file: The :attribute may not be greater than :max kilobytes.
validation/max.string: The :attribute may not be greater than :max characters.
validation/max.array: The :attribute may not have more than :max items.
validation/mimes: The :attribute must be a file of type: :values.
validation/mimetypes: The :attribute must be a file of type: :values.
validation/min.file: The :attribute must be at least :min kilobytes.
validation/min.string: The :attribute must be at least :min characters.
validation/min.array: The :attribute must have at least :min items.
validation/required_if: The :attribute field is required when :other is :value.
validation/required_unless: The :attribute field is required unless :other is in :values.
validation/required_with: The :attribute field is required when :values is present.
validation/required_with_all: The :attribute field is required when :values is present.
validation/required_without: The :attribute field is required when :values is not present.
validation/required_without_all: The :attribute field is required when none of :values are present.
validation/timezone: The :attribute must be a valid zone.
validation/internal.invalid_password: The password provided was invalid for this account.
admin.nests/notices.created: A new nest, :name, has been successfully created.

admin.nests/eggs.notices.script_updated: Egg install script has been updated and will run whenever servers are installed.
admin.nests/eggs.notices.egg_created: A new egg was laid successfully. You will need to restart any running daemons to apply this new egg.
admin.nests/variables.notices.variable_d: The variable ":variable" has been deleted and will no longer be available to servers once rebuilt.
admin.nests/variables.notices.variable_u: The variable ":variable" has been updated. You will need to rebuild any servers using this variable in order to apply changes.

admin.node/notices.node_created: Successfully created new node. You can automatically configure the daemon on this machine by visiting the 'Configuration' tab. Before you can add any servers you must first allocate at least one IP address and port.
admin.node/notices.node_updated: Node information has been updated. If any daemon settings were changed you will need to reboot it for those changes to take effect.
admin.server/exceptions.no_new_default_a: You are attempting to delete the default allocation for this server but there is no fallback allocation to use.

admin.server/exceptions.default_allocati: The requested default allocation was not found in this server's allocations.
admin.server/alerts.startup_changed: The startup configuration for this server has been updated. If this server's nest or egg was changed a reinstall will be occurring now.
admin.server/alerts.server_deleted: Server has successfully been deleted from the system.

admin.server/alerts.build_updated: The build details for this server have been updated. Some changes may require a restart to take effect.
admin.server/alerts.suspension_toggled: Server suspension status has been changed to :status.
admin.server/alerts.rebuild_on_boot: This server has been marked as requiring a Docker Container rebuild. This will happen the next time the server is started.
admin.server/alerts.install_toggled: The installation status for this server has been toggled.

admin.server/alerts.details_updated: Server details have been successfully updated.
admin.server/alerts.docker_image_updated: Successfully changed the default Docker image to use for this server. A reboot is required to apply this change.
admin.server/alerts.node_required: You must have at least one node configured before you can add a server to this panel.
admin.server/alerts.transfer_nodes_requi: You must have at least two nodes configured before you can transfer servers.
admin.server/alerts.transfer_not_viable: The node you selected does not have the required disk space or memory available to accommodate this server.

server.users/permissions.websocket_*: Allows access to the websocket for this server.
server.users/permissions.control_console: Allows the user to send data to the server console.
server.users/permissions.control_start: Allows the user to start the server instance.
server.users/permissions.control_stop: Allows the user to stop the server instance.
server.users/permissions.control_restart: Allows the user to restart the server instance.
server.users/permissions.control_kill: Allows the user to kill the server instance.
server.users/permissions.user_create: Allows the user to create new user accounts for the server.
server.users/permissions.user_read: Allows the user permission to view users associated with this server.
server.users/permissions.user_update: Allows the user to modify other users associated with this server.
server.users/permissions.user_delete: Allows the user to delete other users associated with this server.
server.users/permissions.file_create: Allows the user permission to create new files and directories.
server.users/permissions.file_read: Allows the user to see files and folders associated with this server instance, as well as view their contents.
server.users/permissions.file_update: Allows the user to update files and folders associated with the server.
server.users/permissions.file_delete: Allows the user to delete files and directories.
server.users/permissions.file_archive: Allows the user to create file archives and decompress existing archives.
server.users/permissions.file_sftp: Allows the user to perform the above file actions using a SFTP client.
server.users/permissions.allocation_read: Allows access to the server allocation management pages.
server.users/permissions.allocation_upda: Allows user permission to make modifications to the server's allocations.
server.users/permissions.database_create: Allows user permission to create a new database for the server.
server.users/permissions.database_read: Allows user permission to view the server databases.
server.users/permissions.database_update: Allows a user permission to make modifications to a database. If the user does not have the "View Password" permission as well they will not be able to modify the password.
server.users/permissions.database_delete: Allows a user permission to delete a database instance.
server.users/permissions.database_view_p: Allows a user permission to view a database password in the system.
server.users/permissions.schedule_create: Allows a user to create a new schedule for the server.
server.users/permissions.schedule_read: Allows a user permission to view schedules for a server.
server.users/permissions.schedule_update: Allows a user permission to make modifications to an existing server schedule.
server.users/permissions.schedule_delete: Allows a user to delete a schedule for the server.
